resources.string: Dribble - the anonymous geosocial networking application
Number of Drib Topics to display

Dribble

Created By:
Andrew Paverd
Ashleigh Campbell
Daniel Mankowitz
Chad Epstein

Support:
dribbleapp@gmail.com

Maps Tab: Click to see where you are and surrounding topics.

Near Me Tab: Discover topics from the area around you. Click on a topic to retrieve its Dribs.

Dribs Tab: View Dribs for a particular topic and like/dislike them. Click on a Drib to view it on the map. Click 'reply' to reply to the conversation.

New Tab: Creates a new Drib, click 'Submit' to send.
